name: Dorian
description: Mode II: minor scale with a raised 6. D-C

name: Phrygian
description: Mode III: minor scale with a lowered 2. E-D

name: Lydian
description: Mode IV: major scale with a raised 4. F-E

name: Mixolydian
description: Mode V: major scale with a lowered 7. G-F

name: Aeolian
description: Mode VI: natural minor scale. A-G

name: Locrian
description: Mode VII: minor scale with a lowered 2 and 5. B-A
